entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
